text: One of the most liked “must have” programs I use. Much thanks to the author!
Indispensable tool for people with a large library of videos. Through this program, I was able to restore order in films and serials. Thank you!
Extremely efficient, especially for renaming single episodes.
Pretty awesome piece of software. Very fast and easy to use. As it states: “it just works”.
Wow! I had a large collection of tv shows which I was not looking forward to sorting out. Dumped the files into FileBot and within minutes, all done.
I can really recommend using filebot... I just started the script once... and it was quite mindblowing to be honest.
Absolutely brilliant application. Does everything so smoothly!
Loving FileBot. I only wish I had discovered it sooner. Thank you for saving me so much time!
It will rip through movies and tv series files like a knife through butter.
I would go with FileBot to rename content - over 18,000 files and a 99.8% first time success rate.
Filebot is probably one of the top 5 computer programs I've ever used.
This app has saved me thousands of hours.
This is a new level and the ease of use is amazing!!!
Worth every penny and then some! I can't even start to fathom how much time and mind numbing tedium FileBot has saved me.
Indispensable as far as I am concerned. Simple to use and works every time.
Absolute miracle! I cannot recommend it enough. It made renaming and organizing more than 10.000 files a breeze!
Fantastic application - Shut up and take my money!
A tool I can't live without! One of those programs you don't realize you need until after you have it!
I'm pretty OCD when it comes to organizing my files and this little beauty is my medication. Love it like a Fat Kid Loves Cake!
20,000 files renamed and counting. Best little investment I ever made. Saves me a ton of time on formatting my media files.
Few things are as satisfactory as unleashing FileBot on your media collection and gazing on a universe of neatly, uniformly named files.
Why would you bother looking for a free one at that price when Filebot is absolutely f.....in incredible.
This is one of those applications that is stealthily powerful, and the more you use it, the more you like it!
FileBot just dried my tears. Thank you, Thank you!!!
